welcome_message_body: Welcome to Coquimbo, Chile! Discover the charming coastal town known for its beautiful beaches, historic architecture, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Coquimbo has to offer.

restaurants.name: La Marraqueta Sangucheria
restaurants.description: La Marraqueta Sangucheria is a sandwich spot located in Coquimbo.

restaurants.name: Fuente Liverpool Coquimbo
restaurants.description: Fuente Liverpool Coquimbo is a sandwich spot located in Coquimbo.

restaurants.name: No Chingues
restaurants.description: No Chingues is a taco restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Mercado Coquimbo
restaurants.description: Mercado Coquimbo is a seafood restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Restaurant Hoi Kong
restaurants.description: Restaurant Hoi Kong is a asian restaurant located in Coquimbo.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at La Florida Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at La Florida Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Los Andes Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Los Andes Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and connectivity.
